metadata.name: MERGE XX
metadata.description:
Inspired by an old far eastern game, 'MERGE XX' is a variety of shapes created by combining 7 geometric pieces. When the pieces are put together, they can form hundreds of different shapes.  
-STAGES-  
-The first stage combines the three geometric pieces. (2X BURN)  
-The second stage combines the five geometric pieces. (2X BURN)  
-The third stage combines the seven geometric pieces and creates a completed common shape. (2X BURN)  
-In the fourth stage, each shape obtained with the pieces combined is unique, special and different from each other. (?X BURN)  
Each collector who can complete the fourth stage receives a unique shape that is different from each other.
